    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

            <entry>cahi1:data_97374</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Hydrogen collection</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wasserstoffansammlung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Collection d'hydrogène</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Coleção do hidrogênio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Accumulazione dell'idrogeno</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Συλλογή υδρογόνου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Colección del hidrógeno</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">First of two illustrations showing an experimental set-up for the collection of hydrogen gas. This illustration shows an incorrectly drawn diagram. The other illustration shows a correctly drawn diagram.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">collection</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">delivery tube</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">hydrogen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">thistle funnel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">water</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zuerst von zwei Abbildungen, die eine 
experimentelle Installation für die Ansammlung des Wasserstoffgases 
zeigen. Diese Abbildung zeigt ein falsch gezeichnetes Diagramm. 
Die andere Abbildung zeigt ein richtig gezeichnetes Diagramm.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">D'abord de deux illustrations montrant une 
installation expérimentale pour la collection de gaz d'hydrogène. 
Cette illustration montre un diagramme inexactement tracé. 
L'autre illustration montre un diagramme correctement tracé.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Primeiramente de duas ilustrações que mostram 
uma instalação experimental para a coleção do gás de hidrogênio.
Esta ilustração mostra um diagrama incorretamente desenhado. 
A outra ilustração mostra um diagrama corretamente desenhado.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In primo luogo di due illustrazioni che mostrano 
una messa a punto sperimentale per l'accumulazione dell'idrogeno. 
Questa illustrazione mostra uno schema in modo errato tracciato.
L'altra illustrazione mostra uno schema correttamente tracciato.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πρώτα δύο απεικονίσεων που εμφανίζουν πειραματική 
οργάνωση για τη συλλογή του υδρογόνου αέριο. Αυτή η 
απεικόνιση εμφανίζει ανακριβώς συρμένο διάγραμμα. Η άλλη 
απεικόνιση εμφανίζει σωστά συρμένο διάγραμμα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Primero de dos ilustraciones que muestran una 
disposición experimental para la colección de gas de hidrógeno. 
Esta ilustración muestra un diagrama incorrectamente trazado. 
La otra ilustración muestra un diagrama correctamente trazado.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ansammlung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
